faq.question: What is Atomic Hub CDID?
faq.answer: Atomic Hub CDID is the best, fastest, and safest CDID script in Indonesia. Our script has been trusted for 2 years with proven track record!

faq.question: How much can I earn with autofarm?
faq.answer: Without gamepass (50% Job Earnings): You'll earn 3 Billion+ per hour. With gamepass (50% Job Earnings): You'll earn 5 Billion+ per hour. Results may vary based on server conditions.

faq.question: Is this script safe to use?
faq.answer: Yes, our script has been proven safe for 2 years with thousands of users. We have anti force-close technology that makes our script more stable than competitors.

faq.question: Is this good for service providers?
faq.answer: Excellent question! Yes, our script is perfect for service providers. We have truck autofarm, minigame autofarm, and event autofarm. Almost 100% of CDID service providers use our script for its stability!

faq.question: How do I get support?
faq.answer: Join our Discord at discord.gg/getsades for 24/7 support, payment information, and community help. Our team responds within minutes!

faq.question: Can I see a demo before buying?
faq.answer: Yes! Click the 'Watch Demo' button to see our script in action. You can also join our Discord to see live demonstrations and user showcases.
